alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 02 at 3:14AM EDT until August 03 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.7 to 13.0 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Along the eastern Massachusetts coastline including Nantucket and Marthas Vineyard during the overnight high tide cycle just after midnight. * WHEN...From 11 pm this evening through 2 am Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Pockets of splashover and very minor coastal flooding within an hour or so of high tide. Any impacts will be very minor and not have much of an impact. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
